steps.title: In medicine and public policy, MHM means Menstrual Hygiene Management.
steps.content: In medicine and public policy, MHM means Menstrual Hygiene Management. The acronym refers to access to feminine products and sanitization during the menstrual cycle. [8] X Trustworthy Source Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Main public health institute for the US, run by the Dept. of Health and Human Services Go to source In the world of public health, MHM often appears in discussions around policies supporting womenâ€™s rights and gender equality. â€œOur foundation is working to improve MHM for people in lower-income, rural areas.â€ â€œWhen we think about MHM, we also need to consider the taboos and societal beliefs around menstruation.â€
